    • registerProject

      public boolean registerProject(String name, int durationStage1, int durationStage2, int durationStage3, int durationStage4, int durationStage5, int durationStage6, String clientName, int iday, int imonth, int iyear, int fday, int fmonth, int fyear, double budget, String gerentName, String gerentCellphone)
      This method allow the controller to create a new project with the params that the user entered
      Parameters:
      name - This its the name that the user wants to call the new project
      clientName - This its the client name
      iday - This its the day of the creation of the project
      imonth - This its the month of the creation of the project
      iyear - This its the year of the creation of the project
      fday - This its the day of the end of the project
      fmonth - This its the month of the end of the project
      fyear - This its the year of the end of the project
      budget - This its the budget that the project have
      gerentName - This its the name of the gerent of the project
      gerentCellphone - This its the cellphone of the genert of the project
      Returns:
      indicator This indicates if a new project was created or not

    • showApprovedKnowlegdeUnitList

      public String showApprovedKnowlegdeUnitList(int projtChoice)
      This Java function returns a message containing a list of approved knowledge units for a given project choice.
      Parameters:
      projtChoice - an integer representing the user's choice of project (1 to the total number of projects available)
      Returns:
      A String message containing either an error message if the project does not exist or a list of approved knowledge units for the specified project.

    • publishKnowledgeUnit

      public boolean publishKnowledgeUnit(int choiceProject, int choice)
      This function publishes a knowledge unit for a chosen project and returns a boolean indicating whether the operation was successful or not.
      Parameters:
      choiceProject - An integer representing the user's choice of project (presumably from a list of available projects).
      choice - The parameter "choice" is not defined in the given method. It is likely a parameter that is passed to the "publishKnowledgeUnit" method within the "projects" array. Without more context or information about the code, it is difficult to determine the exact purpose of this parameter.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a boolean value, which indicates whether the knowledge unit was successfully published or not. If the knowledge unit was published successfully, the method returns true, otherwise it returns false.

    • consultKnowledgeUnitType

      public String consultKnowledgeUnitType()
      This function calculates the number of knowledge units of different types in a set of projects and returns a message with the results.
      Returns:
      A String message containing the number of knowledge units (capsulas) for each stage of a project.

    • consultLearnedLeccionByStage

      public String consultLearnedLeccionByStage(int choice)
      This function returns a message containing the learned lessons for a given stage in all projects.
      Parameters:
      choice - The parameter "choice" is an integer that represents the stage of a project. The method "consultLearnedLeccionByStage" is called on each project in an array of projects, and it returns a message containing the learned lessons for the specified stage of each project. The messages are concatenated
      Returns:
      The method is returning a String message that contains the learned lessons for a specific stage in all the projects stored in an array.

    • consultMostRegisteredKnowledgeUnitsByProject

      Returns:
      A message indicating the project with the most registered knowledge units.

    • consultProjectsByCollaborator

      public String consultProjectsByCollaborator(String choice)
      This function returns a message containing information about projects that a collaborator is involved in.
      Parameters:
      choice - The parameter "choice" is a String that represents the name of a collaborator. This method is used to consult all the projects in which the collaborator has participated.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a String message that contains the projects that a collaborator is involved in. If there are no projects registered for the collaborator, the message will indicate that there are no capsules registered for them.

    • consultByHashtag

      public String consultByHashtag(String choice)
      This Java function searches for projects by a given hashtag and returns a message with the results or a "not found" message.
      Parameters:
      choice - a String representing the hashtag that the user wants to search for in the projects array. The method loops through the projects array and calls the consultByHashtag method on each project object, passing in the choice parameter. It then concatenates the returned message from each project and returns the final message. If
      Returns:
      A String message that contains the result of the consultation by hashtag on all the projects. If there are no capsules published with the given hashtag, the message will indicate that.
